summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FOMO crypto landing page with unified admin panel. Backend APIs working at 93.8% success rate, frontend UI fully functional with glassmorphism navigation, 3D project carousel, team flip cards slider, and unified admin panel with Projects/Team tabs.

minor_issues.issue: PIL library not available for image upload testing
minor_issues.workaround: Image upload API endpoint exists and responds correctly, just missing PIL for test file creation

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu button click timeout during automated testing
ui_bugs.note: May be timing issue in test, mobile menu button is visible and functional

passed_tests: Glassmorphism navigation with all required links
Team section with horizontal slider and flip cards
Unified Admin Panel opening and tab switching
Admin login flow with localStorage token
Projects and Team tab functionality in admin panel
